role.argrole: as what / on what (usually marked by على)

example.parse: (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يستغفر) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_NOM الجميع)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_ACC الله)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المسخ))) (NAC (CONJ و) (S-ADV (VP (PSEUDO_VERB كأن) (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS ه)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM طارئ) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الحياة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطنية))))
